Text:
how do you get at the data? i downloaded the file but I have a dat. file and a bunch of utorrent files. what to do?

other than that great torrent. please just include better directions so noobs can use it too.

Thanks  so much,

Yan Hui

Hi Yan Hui , this is a collection of torrent files you have to open each torrent file with utorrent (a peer to peer client) - search on google if you don't have it. Then utorrent will connect to pcs around the world and download the videos for you.  You don't have to download all the files -just the ones you want to watch.
